channel.title: Short-Blog on tourpran
channel.description: Recent content in Short-Blog on tourpran

item.title: Dynamic and Static Linking
item.description: We will take a quick look into the different types of linking of libraries to the ELF in x86 (linux).

item.title: Global Offset Table and Procedure Linkage Table
item.description: How do programs know where the libc functions are in the libc, How is the internal implementation of the same ? We will look into GOT and PLT in short in this one.
